title: Thomas Graham (Award Winner For Worst Guy)
content:

------

[[=]]

------

[[image https://i.imgur.com/Amep7mu.png]]

[[/=]]

------

Thomas Graham, Director of Site-17 and main antagonist of the Deepwell Catalog. He's very nasty and small, and not in the endearing way. I'm putting him in the garbage and punching his stupid little ribs. I despise him.
